name: Jeweler
firstNightReminder: Wake up the demon, show them the Jeweler token and have them choose a player. If the Jeweler is chosen, put the Poisoned reminder token on them.
otherNightReminder: On the 3rd night, wake up the Jewler and show them a set of character tokens identical to the ones you showed the demon during the Demon Info step on the first night.
ability: Your first 3 nights, the demon chooses a player; if chosen, you are poisoned. On your third night you learn the Demon Bluffs.
